{"id":897643752,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1676352441,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/897643752/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"39.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isHappy(int n) {\n        ArrayList<Integer> a = new ArrayList<>();\n        int temp = n;\n        while (temp >= 7) {\n            while (temp != 0) {\n                a.add(temp % 10);\n                temp = temp / 10;\n            }\n            for(Integer x: a){\n                temp += Math.pow(x, 2);\n            }\n            a.clear();\n        }\n        return temp == 1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false}
